channel.title: Irrigations on Pooya Shirazi
channel.description: Recent content in Irrigations on Pooya Shirazi

item.title: Session 03
item.description: Reference WATER MEASUREMENT MANUAL: A guide to effective water measurement practices for better water management. Sample Report To write an appropirate report, we are suggesting to use the Sample Report file. Each team should submit their report in “PDF” or “Word Document”. How Your Report Score Is Calculated? Your final score for a report is the sum of the scores for all of the report parts: Report Score
